title: ST_Within
description: Return true if A is completely inside B.
kernels:
  - returns: boolean
    args: [geometry, geometry]
---

## Examples

```sql
SELECT ST_Within(ST_GeomFromWKT('POINT(1 1)'), ST_GeomFromWKT('POLYGON((0 0, 2 0, 2 2, 0 2, 0 0))'));
```
